title: Chicago Mayor Blames Whites For Black On White Crime
description:
In this video, I discuss the recent fall out in Chicago after a repeat offender with 72 previous arrests allegedly set a 26 year old woman on fire on the Chicago train. I explain how Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is trying to use this crime to fill his massive budget deficit, rather than dealing with the issue at hand
